div.h2: NUBC Dispensed As Written Or Product Selection Code

div.p: Prescriber's instruction regarding substitution of generic equivalents or order to dispense the specific prescribed medication. NCPDP field # 408-D8 (Dispensed As Written (DAW)/Product Selection Code).
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

title.value: NUBC Dispensed As Written Or Product Selection Code

description.value: Prescriber's instruction regarding substitution of generic equivalents or order to dispense the specific prescribed medication. NCPDP field # 408-D8 (Dispensed As Written (DAW)/Product Selection Code).
